html:
12.14.19  2:11 pm   Do you often find yourself chewing on ice?

     no

12.14.19  1:22 pm   When do you find the time to sleep during this near-constant question-addressing schedule?

     it is not a constant question-addressing schedule. what may seem constant is the question asking, but i am able to sleep while many of the questions are being asked. for example, i was asleep while your question was asked

12.14.19  1:16 pm   What is the worst question you have ever been asked? 

     anything that specifically asks for a negative answer

12.14.19  12:50 pm   How do I make a sandwich?

     from sandwich concentrate. just add water

12.14.19  12:44 pm   why are there only 26 letters in the English alphabet?

     why are there only 42 letters in your question

12.14.19  12:18 pm   You'll probably answer this with "[your brand here] ad space available" but i still want to ask because i need input and have no one else to ask. which headphones do you use for your music production? if you don't want to mention any brand, at least give me some advice regarding specifications. I'm new at music production and i just realized that i need more than what i have that is cheap Philips headphone. If you still don't want to answer, it's ok. Thanks.

     you need something that you're used to. if you are looking to get something in a higher price range than the phillips, just make sure it is not advertising "super monster bass boost!!!!!" .... because if you get something with exagerated bass, that might cause you to go too light on the bass. that's about it. and make sure to listen to a lot of music on it first to get used to it. also it's good to have several different ones, to test

12.14.19  11:35 am   are you a gamer?

     i'm a game

12.14.19  10:40 am   Bill what is your favorite airport terminal?

     denver

12.14.19  10:16 am   what's your opinion on a piece of toast going on an adventure?

     it's good. my opinion on that is good. the toasting process is an adventure unto itself, but more additional subsequent adventures would be good for the toast. recommend. would like to join if possible. thanks for your question

12.14.19  9:31 am   do you ever notice sometimes that people laugh at what you say but you yourself don't necessarily think it's funny?

     yes

12.14.19  8:50 am   what are your thoughts on brexit?

     seems like brenter was just yesterday

12.14.19  8:43 am   What should I do if I open a door and then every single doorknob in my house falls off? Please note that this did not happen, I would just like to be prepared for what to do if it ever does happen.

     to be truly prepared, you must set up video cameras pointed at all the doorknobs, before it happens

12.14.19  8:33 am   what happens when a large get bigger?

     more large

12.14.19  8:31 am   Is Christmas real

     sort of

12.14.19  7:59 am   How do you know how many people ask you stuff?

     i don't

      for all you know its only one person doing everything

     i'm quite sure it's not, just based on the nature of the questions

12.14.19  7:30 am   do u wanna be the president of our country?

     that sounds impossibly stressful and dangerous

12.14.19  6:27 am   i brought a new bass today. what should i play

     play along to song recordings. turn down the low frequency on the recording. then play along to them as if you were the bass player on the song

12.14.19  6:05 am   Can you do a song about how I asked a question then forgot about the question then came here to read more questions only to realise that the answer was inside me all along?

     sure yes, that sounds like a good idea

12.14.19  4:24 am   if we'd meet in person, would a hug be okay?

     no, that wouldn't make sense if we're only just meeting for the first time

12.14.19  4:15 am   opinion on questions?

     they're pretty good

12.14.19  3:55 am   Best movie ever you watched?

     they are all too good and bad, i can hardly stand it

12.14.19  2:37 am   I really wanna write a book with an alien character inspired by u. What are your thoughts on this 

     the hardest part is getting the pages attached to the book

12.14.19  2:35 am   I signed up for 16 weeks of an online class, and now all assignments that I never finished are due today. What should I do?

     do them, unless that's impossible

12.14.19  1:39 am   You know, it's odd that in the attention spidr web of youtube, where evry youtuber is vying for views and likes and subs etc, it is you, bill Wurtz, that i always seem to come back to. I cant put my finger on exactly why (maybe for the same reason that describng music is almost entirely impossible??) but i know that you, on average, make me feel happy, but that average also skims over the bits where u make me feel sad or reflective or bewildered or worried or whtever else we percieve (those feelings arent bad, theyre feelings). Above all, you make me think, and you challenge me not to think too highly. so i guess this is a thank you for your remixes of human ideas.

     thank you for your sudden outburst of friendliness

     
(I also realize this isnt a question...
How can I turn it into one?

     not necessary

12.14.19  12:49 am   do your advisory statements on this page apply to more than just music?

     i'm sure they do, but which ones do you mean

      i'm attempting to work on many many many personal projects having to do with illustration and narrative storytelling, but i can't convince myself to put down distractions or feel motivated enough to start. the worst part is that i have many other things going on at the same time and i feel very overwhelmed to the point of giving up and deciding to play video games or watch other content on youtube, twitch, etc. i've tried some tactics, like writing down small thoughts that pop into my brain randomly, but it's beginning to feel more like an external catalogue than a bonafide process and that scares me because i worry that i'll never start this damn thing, let alone get it done.

     the only thing that ever works for me, is to turn on an audio recording (and video if possible) and just start explaining every aspect of the situation in great detail, and usually some strategies emerge

12.14.19  12:41 am   How many cats can one person own before it starts to become concerning?

     49

12.14.19  12:21 am   Have you ever thought about how the b in thumb is silent

     yea. it's dumb

12.14.19  12:00 am   what do you like about your car?

     looks like most other cars. does not stand out

12.13.19  11:57 pm   do you in spaghetti sauce rub meatball all over my overalls while i eat your garlic bread

     no but that sounds romantic

12.13.19  11:42 pm   Listening to your songs helped me awaken 5 brain cells. Thank you, I owe you my life.

     fair enough

12.13.19  11:39 pm   A duck walks up to a lemonade stand

     i want to believe you

12.13.19  11:31 pm   Why are red pens so much more common than orange pens?

     orange is a more complicated color

12.13.19  11:22 pm   to get to my goals, i have to do many things that i'm not so good at (i guess that's just how it goes). How do i attempt to make these things more bearable along the way?

     make up a song about it

12.13.19  11:17 pm   do you ever just want to set the world on fire

     not necessary, it's already on fire

12.13.19  11:06 pm   have you ever forgot to send a you're welcome card when someone sends you a thank you card? what did you do??

     send an i'm sorry card

12.13.19  11:04 pm   why would anyone do anything that makes people feel bad

     by accident maybe. or for revenge

12.13.19  10:54 pm   Bill do you think anyone will ever love me 

     yes, i think some people already do

12.13.19  10:51 pm   do you answer old questions first or new ones first? 

     i only answer new questions, but i answer them in the order they were received. so each question answered is slightly newer than the previous

12.13.19  10:39 pm   what is a green bean?

     a symbol of love. also a symbol of hatred. it all depends on the intentions of the beanholder

12.13.19  10:38 pm   where is the money tree

     got to be in switzerland somewhere

12.13.19  10:24 pm   Why cook bread again when it's already been cooked?

     maybe if you're drunk and it's party time

12.13.19  10:23 pm   Is the earth flat?

     it's actually very wavy

12.13.19  10:12 pm   can we get a reality video of you yelling at people while you're in traffic?

     no, i don't do that

      i know you be recorded dem car rides boi. road raging with epic musical punctuations. and now i guess i'm firmly secured that that will never happen because i know you don't like taking suggestions, but maybe by saying that i can reverse psychology you into doing it just to spite me, except i just explained the reverse psychology so now it's basically no psychology but anyways that's just an idea i had but really i should probably just do it myfucking self because god knows i have a lot of recordings of me losing my shit in traffic.

     every minute of my driving time is recorded but you simply won't find anger toward other drivers

12.13.19  10:07 pm   i'm having an extensive argument/conversation/therapy session with an imaginary wise person who's also me and it's both thrilling and educational. i really should do this more often. do you type to yourself to work things out much or is it mostly talk these days?

     it was mostly typing until about 2011 then it was more talking

12.13.19  10:05 pm   "And the day goes on" or "the moon is made of cheese (but I cant taste it)"?

     what about them

12.13.19  9:52 pm   Where's your 3D work?!?!

     little bits can be seen in every video since history of the entire world, but that is likely only scratching the surface

12.13.19  9:49 pm   Do you ever regret mentioning Velcro (in "Wild Frolicking Adventures of Informational Education") in response to the heaps of questions you receive about it?

     no, it was the perfect decision, and it keeps the universe in balance

      (If it matters, trust that I am not trying to contribute to the aforementioned heap with this question.)

12.13.19  9:45 pm   how do i make friends

     it's you. you are the friend. now go out there and be friends

12.13.19  9:41 pm   when will you make more songs

     extremely right away

12.13.19  9:17 pm   Bill help me decide what to eat for lunch

     MOSTLY CABBAGE, HOW ABOUT
